item.description:
For the folks not going to WAPA's meeting, let's fly out for dinner.... Something easy.
Maybe we venture out to Parlin 2B3 for taco's at Lil Red Baron. Right on the field.. eeehhhh.. Only a half hour flight...

http://www.navmonster...

http://www.flyinggeta...

The WAPA speaker is the same one we had last year on wx.

AFN for Lobster rolls and some of those fried pepper rings!

I'm in for flying. Wx should be good....

How else can you FOFS?
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Just a cheapo dinner out!
